price: Магар Иблис, ки такаббур варзид ва кофир шуд
arabic: إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرَ وَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Tajik translation - Arfy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tajik by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: illā ib'līsa is'takbara wakāna mina al-kāfirīna
